title: typeface for wordmark that conveys spatial technologies producing clean energy
content:
Alas, I am not very good at recognising the subtle and  
powerful voice a typeface speak with.

I hope you could help me with some few suggestions  
of typefaces conveying 'clean energy', 'spatial technologies'.

I would say Futura and Century Gothic would be two good options  
but I well know I can be far from hitting the nail on the head.

Thanks so much in advance for your sound advice.
author: DumbType

comments.content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/biome-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416032049/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/biome-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/biome-pro/")  
But you'd need a good text font companion.

Avoid things like Fartura and So Last Century like the plague.

hhp

Thanks a lot hrant for your helpful advice.  
I think Biome Pro it's a very suitable typeface.
